name: inevitability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being certain to happen and unable to be avoided or prevented: the inevitability of change His created a sense of inevitability around his campaign. See
inevitable
More examplesFewer examplesHe conveyed a belief in historical inevitability.The contest has had an air of inevitability for weeks.Once the shock of his sudden death began to wear off, there was a tragic inevitability about it.
